name: korfball
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a game similar to basketball, in which two teams either of eight women or of four men and four women score points by throwing a ball through an open net hanging from a tall pole: Korfball is a team sport most popular in the Netherlands and Belgium that both boys and girls can play together.
Dean Mouhtaropoulos/Getty Images Sport/GettyImages
